You're always welcome here at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn, and we hope that we will see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Customer Care Reps - Mary & Raul
Summary: Class act - employees- Mary & Raul - made my visit to this beautiful- clean hotel a very rewarding experience!  I highly recommend this Best Western Plus if you‚Äôre ever in this part of Southern California- and a plus is the free breakfast!  Great rooms - very clean and restful - felt very much like any 4 or 5 star Las Vegas style hotel - very private - this was an extra plus! I highly recommend!  Rico
Manager Response: Dear Rico, Wow! What a wonderful review. We're thrilled that you loved your stay here at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn, and we will pass along those kind words to our team members. Earning your recommendation is an honor, and we can't wait for the chance to welcome you back for another great visit!

Summary: Front desk was quick and friendly. Breakfast was great with a lot of choices. I will stay here again when in Costa Mesa. It is on one way street but not hard to get to. Hotel has underground parking to protect your car.
Manager Response: Dear Andersen, We're delighted you enjoyed your stay at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn! It's wonderful to hear that our friendly staff made you feel welcome and that our excellent breakfast menu left you feeling full and satisfied. We're glad you appreciated our secure parking and secluded location. Please come see us again soon!

Summary: I'm kind of bougie when it comes to hotels, but we needed a quick, last minute, inexpensive place to stay the night in the OC, and this place looked like it fit the part, so this is where I booked! My bougie ass of course has to book the best room in the place, and that's where the 4 and not 5 star rating comes into play. I booked the room  with the jetted tub. Welp...the tub in our room(room 225) didn't hold water. the stopper would not plug up the tub, rendering our jetted tub useless.  I call down to the front desk, and the man running the show TRIED to tell me too bad, so sad. he tried the whole "well but you've already used the room" card....UMM no dude. we've been in the room for 15 minutes.  we literally haven't even sat down yet. then he said, "but its midnight, we have
Manager Response: Dear Sandy, Thank you for your detailed, thoughtful review of Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn! It was our pleasure to accommodate your last minute travel plans. We apologize that you had some issues with your hot tub, but we're proud that we were able to move you to a more suitable room and we're glad that the tub worked properly. Thank you for allowing us to make things right for you and exceed your expectations. Depend on us anytime for a relaxing, full-value experience!

Summary: Husband and I stayed here Mar 15-18 for the car show that was just across the freeway.  Location was easy to get to, even though it's on a one-way.  Rooms were spacious and clean, as was the rest of the facility.  We felt value was very good and staff were awesome.  Breakfast is just across the driveway in a separate building and it was a decent hot meal.  Staff there were very accommodating as well.  Never used the pool, but took a look.  Was a bit small, and kids seemed to enjoy it.  Having a laundry facility was great when traveling just make sure you are done before it locks up for the evening!!
Manager Response: On behalf of our team, thank you for joining us here at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn. It's fantastic to know that our location was convenient for your needs and that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and friendly staff during your stay. During your next visit to the city, we look forward to sharing even more of our refreshing amenities, and we wish you safe and happy travels along your way.

Summary: This is one of my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù hotels in the area. The price is reasonable and the breakfast buffet is very good for the price you pay. The rooms are clean and updated. You can walk half a block to a nice little Starbucks and there‚Äôs a couple of decent restaurants in that same complex. I find it central for the highway, the beach and the mall.

Summary Heading: The best Best Western + we've ever stayed in
Summary: Pleasant staff ‚Ä¢ great location ‚Ä¢ excellent pricing ‚Ä¢ vert well kempt property ‚Ä¢ decent breakfast. If you're looking for a nice place to stay in Orange County, California, this is a great  place. Close to beaches, shopping.
Manager Response: Dear Gayle, We take pride in offering convenient, welcoming accommodations at an affordable rate, so we're glad to know you appreciated our efforts. It's great to hear that our tasty breakfast menu was to your liking and that your overall stay was pleasant. Thank you for the lovely review! Please come stay at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn again soon.

Summary: This was our first time at a BW Plus. The room was very spacious. The staff was incredible. There was a fridge and microwave in the room which was very clean, comfortable and nicely decorated.  The bed was very firm, which we prefer a softer bed, but the pillows were great.  The heater/air conditioner was a bit loud for me, but I‚Äôm sensitive to sounds. We could not hear the freeway or the other guests.  The breakfast was one of the best complimentary breakfasts we‚Äôve ever had.The staff was wonderful at the eating area, too.  This is not a 5 star hotel, but a good value for all you get and certainly worth staying at.
Manager Response: It's always a pleasure hearing from our guests. We're thrilled our clean, spacious rooms provided you with the ideal place to rest and that our friendly staff impressed you with their commitment to service with a smile. Thank you for your compliments on our delicious breakfast. It's unfortunate the bed and AC were less appealing than you'd hoped, but we're glad these were only minor concerns. During your next trip to town, we welcome you to stay with us again.

Summary: We were impressed with this property on our recent visit. The rooms were clean, spacious, and quiet despite proximity of the freeway. Plenty of free parking, great location with easy access to many attractions, and an awesome FREE breakfast with many wonderful choices; far beyond the usual standard fare. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Kim, Our goal is to impress everyone who stays at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn, so it's gratifying to know we succeeded with you! Thank you for sharing how much you enjoyed your stay in our quiet, spacious rooms. We're thrilled our variety of breakfast options was to your liking and that you were easily able to find a place to park. The next time you're in town, we'd be proud to host you again.

Summary Heading: The reviews and ratings aren‚Äôt accurate
Summary: We checked in to this hotel and the first room had issues with the toilet, the second room had such a strong fragrance odor that my nose was burning within 10 minutes. We ended up booking another hotel and leaving. They were kind and gracious throughout this and did provide a refund. Please be advised that this hotel is low-end and outdated.  For some reason the reviews do not match what we found when we arrived. If you want clean, comfortable, safe and fairly updated... DO NOT STAY HERE!
Manager Response: Dear Renee,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. We're disappointed to hear that you decided not to stay with us during your time in town, and for the lapse in maintenance that you encountered, this is not representative of the service we strive to offer. Regarding the modernity of our property, we completed renovations just last year and are sorry if they weren't to your preference. Your comments are appreciated, and we wish you happy and safe travels going forward.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for business
Summary: The room was quiet, clean and spacious. Front desk staff was always helpful and friendly. Late check out was very helpful. The breakfast was great! Real eggs and bacon, great juice selection and not watered down like most hotels. The breakfast staff was very helpful too. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review. We're so pleased that you had a restful stay in our clean, quiet rooms. It's great to hear that our variety of breakfast options suited your tastes and that our friendly staff was able to assist with all your needs. Should you find yourself back in the area, we welcome you to stay with us again.

Summary: Very nice staff, great location for my family program meeting. Breakfast and  plenty of parking was available. Love the shuttle service to and from SNA. The rooms were very quiet. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: From our peaceful atmosphere and gracious team members to our abundant suite of amenities, we aim to be the perfect option for travelers on the go, and we're ecstatic you had everything you needed for a comfortable and convenient stay at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn! We are also delighted that our location was perfect for your meeting and we hope it was successful. It would be a treat to welcome you back and thank you so much for your recommendation!

Summary: We had a great experience for our quick 1-night stay.  The hotel lobby was nicely decorated for Christmas.  The bed was comfortable.  We utilized the free airport transportation, which was a nice perk.  We enjoyed the free breakfast, in which the hot items were served by staff.  The free snacks in our room were an added bonus that we didn't expect. They also provided many toiletries in the room, including toothbrush and toothpaste and other items you wouldn't typically expect.
Manager Response: We loved reading your outstanding review of Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn! It's always fun to decorate our lobby for the holidays, and we're glad it enhanced your visit. We're also delighted that our comfortable, well-stocked accommodations and wonderful amenities exceeded your expectations for an enjoyable overnight stay. Many thanks for your warm compliments and we'd be honored to have you return.

Summary: We booked this hotel again because of Breakfast, Car Park, Gym and Laundry. The rooms were upgrade recently. Moving around with rental car was certainly useful. Place is quiet and security is good. Another great stay for about 8 Days!
Manager Response: Dear Pari, We cannot think of better compliments than your return visit and your trust to provide you a five-star stay for your eight days with us! As you mentioned, our many amenities on-site are ideal for guests to get the most out of their visit and we are thrilled to hear you took full advantage during your time here. On behalf of all of us at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn, thank you for the spectacular review! See you again soon!

Summary: The Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn located in Costa Mesa is a wonderful hotel! The rooms are affordable, super clean, centrally located to the beaches, many sightseeing activities in Southern California, as well as John Wayne airport and major freeways. The rooms are very comfortable and updated. The staff is very kind and professional. The hotel offers a complimentary hot breakfast which has a lot of delicious choices. It is a wonderful place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Robert, It was a delight to be the retreat you needed here in Mesa! We are elated that our spotless, modern rooms provided you a comfortable place to relax, especially after a fun day of exploring the local area. We're also glad that breakfast gave you the energy you needed to take on your daily adventures. Please, come back to Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn when you can!

Summary: The location is very convenient, free and plentiful parking, I liked the lobby, the front desk people were very friendly and efficient. The only 2 complaints I have are about the smell in the room (it was an acrid, probably cleaner or disinfectant) and the noise of the A/C-heater unit. There was no way to stop the fan from running, even if the room was at the correct temperature. We didn't have time for breakfast, but we did have their lobby coffee service, which was nice. It's very close to good restaurants, one that stays open very late.
Manager Response: We always enjoy hearing from our guests, and we're glad to know our convenient location was ideal for your trip. Our wonderful staff will also be proud that their commitment to service with a smile impressed you. However, we apologize for any concerns about odor as well as for any issues with the AC. We'll pass your comments along to the appropriate staff members, and we invite you to stay with us again the next time you're in town.

Summary: Highly recommend this particular Best Western Plus....clean, which is a big deal to me, kind employees who actually talk to you and are concerned with your needs. Ten minutes from Lido Marina Village. The breakfast had many choices and employees were on top of the tables and food. I would stay here again and recommend it to anyone looking in this area. Bed was comfortable, bathroom clean. Nobody paid me for this review...this is a genuine review.
Manager Response: On behalf of our team, thank you for taking a moment to share some thoughts on your recent stay. Providing clean, comfortable and convenient accommodations is always our primary goal, so we were delighted to hear you enjoyed all three aspects during your visit. It's fantastic to know you liked our delicious breakfast, comfortable beds, and kind staff during your stay, and we look forward to providing another five-star experience here at the Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn when your travels bring you back our way.

Summary: The not so good‚ÄîDidn‚Äôt honor elite membership status by upgrading to best available room (tsk, tsk!) and bathroom amenities consisted of half-used bottles of shower gels, shampoos & lotions. Also, no USB ports to charge in Executive Business class room? It‚Äôs 2018, folks! C‚Äômon!

We're grateful for your business and hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Very large room, comfortable king size bed, good lighting, sitting area with couch, refrigerator, coffee/tea making.  Quiet. Welcome water and snack in the room. Very good breakfast for a 3 star hotel, including two kinds of eggs, bacon, sausage, yogurt dispenser, fresh fruit, etc. Food constantly refilled. Coffee in the lobby. About 10-15 minutes from the Segestrom Center.
Manager Response: Dear Zuzka, It brightens our day to read that you enjoyed an excellent experience here at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn! Thank you so much for the stellar feedback. Our spacious, comfortable, and well-appointed accommodations are a perfect retreat here in town. Along with our tasty breakfast, we strive to provide all the convenience of home. Thank you for encouraging us with your review! We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: In town for a beach music festival, just stayed one night.  Front office staff were friendly and helpful; let us check in early.  Parking was free (a plus!).  Room was fine, and decently priced.  Free breakfast was wonderful!  Would stay again.  In fact, I wish I would've stayed here when I went to the fair over the summer... it's walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Toni, Our friendly staff truly enjoyed hosting you and will be thrilled you appreciated their kind assistance. We were happy to accommodate your early check-in and offer you a tasty breakfast. It's great to hear that our competitive rates and included parking added to your experience. We'd be honored to have you stay with us again during your next trip.

Summary: This BW Hotel was our last stop on our 3 weeks' trip through California, Nevada, Utah and Arizona, and it was absolutely the right choice. Everything met our expectations perfectly. Nice, clean, spacious and quiet room, friendly and helpful staff and convenient parking on-site, delicious breakfast. Very good location to explore "the beaches", Disneyland and Long Beach. OK, this hotel is not so close to LAX International Airport, but the freeways bring you there in less than one hour. During our earlier visits to Los Angeles, we always stayed in Santa Monica. But next time, we will definitely come back to the BW Plus Newport Mesa in Costa Mesa!
Manager Response: We love when our guests leave happy! From our clean accommodations to our convenient location, it's fabulous to know that we met your needs and that you would be our guest again at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn. Many thanks for the five-star rating, and we'll hopefully see you soon!

Summary: Very attentive staff, beautiful lobby. We stayed in a room with a very comfortable king size bed, nicely decorated room. There is a nice pool in the back away from traffic,so quite and private.  Great breakfast, plenty of choices, the servers were very friendly and helpful.  We will definitely stay here again

Had to get a room at the last minute because plans fell through. Got a good room at a great rate. Room was clean, beds comfortable, and shower had good pressure. Breakfast was ‚Äòmeh.‚Äô  No yogurt which I usually have. Eggs looked good (I don‚Äôt eat them) and sausage wasn‚Äôt bad. We've stayed at this property many times and have never been disappointed.  Rooms are clean and fresh, breakfast is great, staff are friendly and it is in a safe and convenient area.  Beds are very comfortable and we always have a good night's sleep.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: There is no greater compliment a guest can provide a hotel than his or her return business. Thank you so much for indicating that you plan to come back to stay with us at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn. We were so pleased to offer you a five-star experience and look forward to impressing you again soon.

Summary: This was our second stay. The first was during off-season. This was high season and property was rather full. Room was fine. Clean, comfortable, quiet. The highlight was breakfast. They serve the best hotel included breakfast we have found. Two different egg choices, meat, potato, waffle, fruit, cereal, pastry, breads. Fresh and tasty.  As a diabetic I liked the amount of non-carbohydrate offerings. The breakfast room had plenty of seating.  Access is a tad complex as it is on a one-way street. Close to "everything".

Summary Heading: friendly staff. very close to the beach and Fashion Plaza and the OC Fair
Summary: Wonderful staff!  Rooms were very clean with robes and slippers available for use at no additional charge.  Snacks and water available at no additional charge.  Very safe and friendly location.  Free breakfast available and many restaurants close by.  I was able to wash my car 1 mile away and get to Fashion Plaza within 10 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth, Many thanks for your kind review of Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn. It sounds like you had a ball exploring the OC Fair and Fashion Island, not to mention the beaches and restaurants! We also delighted that you enjoyed our secure, spotless accommodations, friendly service, and great amenities. Your warm praise is truly appreciated. We'd love you to visit us again.

Summary: This is an exceptional hotel. For the price I've paid, there's no word to express how lucky and greatfull I am to have found this. This is the hotel I will always stay in when I'm in the Orange County.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! It brightens our day to hear that your stay at the Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn was exceptional and that the value was perfect for you. Our amazing team strives to provide relaxing and comfortable accommodations, and we're so glad your visit met all of your expectations. Thank you for your feedback, and we can't wait to see you again next time you are in Orange County!

Summary: The motel was clean and the staff was really friendly and helpful. It is an older motel but pleasant enough. The room was spacious with separate toilet/shower room, vanity sink. The beds were comfortable. The pillows were a bit on the hard side (one or two soft.) We were there for medical reasons so we spent a lot of time in the room which was mostly quiet. If there are noisy neighbors then that comes thru the door. The motel is local off a smaller freeway so it's not "difficult" to get to but it requires a certain approach (one way) since the entrance to the freeway is in front of the motel. However, we never heard any "freeway" noise. There is a small pool.  We didn't use it but looked clean and maintained. There is continental breakfast located across from the main lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a detailed review of your recent stay. We're delighted to hear that you found our rooms clean, beds comfortable, and extensive breakfast selection highlights of your stay. It's unfortunate to learn that the Wi-Fi was not to your preference, and we'll be sure to contact our contractor so they may resolve any issue. Should your travels bring you back to the area, we would love to host you for an even better stay.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfy, close to CA-55 freeway
Summary: Clean room; not too big or busy; great breakfast included. Convenient location next to the CA55 freeway; close to John Wayne and Long Beach airports, Disneyland, and Anaheim. Free parking; gas station, Starbucks, Jack In the Box, and Circle K within five minute walk.

The facility is conveniently located by Vangaurd University. Very clean and fresh rooms. The staff was professional and polite. The breakfast was excellent with a variety of choices. The beds were very comfortable.

The staff were nice. The  hotel is ok.  The room was big, clean and comfortable. Just a place to stay one or two nights. No more than that. But still is not a bad option to stay. Includes breakfeast but i didnt have time to try it.

We value your feedback by telling us what you like about your stay and how we can implement more  improvement. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your warm complements to our staff members. Hope to serve you once again in the near future and to be able to earn your 100% satisfaction.   Sincerely,

Summary Heading: One of the best hotel experiences!
Summary: I like to travel and have stayed in many hotels throughout the U.S. This was one of the best hotel experiences I've had. Definitely in the top 5. The service was great, the breakfast was good and the overall experience of the amenities, hotel staff and hotel room was great!

Summary Heading: WOw! Legit customer service & stunning hotel
Summary: We had a wonderful time in Costa Mesa for a large conference. I was able to check in early and the receptionist/ staff was always very helpful. Romi is my favorite and I was very impressed with how she handled an incredibly difficult situation.She was amazing. She also out up with my early check in time like a champ and was fun to talk to. I would highly recommend this hotel since it was beautiful, clean and a great price to boot!

Come back and see us again at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn.

Summary: All the little touches that make a difference. The room was great, real coffee cups, some snacks, nice bed. Loved the big comfy chair and the multiple goodies in the bathroom. Very nice breakfast buffet and warm, friendly service. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Catherine, We are very happy to impress! As you said so well, we believe that the little touches here at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn add up to a value to remember. Thank you for highlighting our variety of amenities that contributed to your comfortable experience. We would love to have you back!

Summary: We stayed for a week in this hotel. The room was clean and quiet. The wifi worked very well. The hot breakfast was very good. The neighborhood seemed fine. It is very convenient, being next to the 55. We stayed in a room on the east side, facing the parking lot, and it was very quiet--no noise from the 55. I would stay in this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Ronald, Thank you for taking the time to provide such wonderful feedback about your visit. We are thrilled to hear that our quiet room, strong WiFi, and our hot breakfast all met your expectations! We hope your trip went well and would love to see you again next time you're in the area!

Summary: I come to this area regularly from northern CA to see my doctor.  I fly into SNA-John Wayne and need a hotel that has transportation to/from the airport.  I have stayed at several hotels here and this is by far the best value.  This stay was 3 nights (arrival day, surgery day,  recovery day) and no other local 3 or 4 star property comes close to quality for price.  Great airport transportation, breakfast, nearby eats, quiet room, amenities (bed is a little too soft for my taste), great staff... Best Western Plus is a standard for incredible value and reliable quality.  This property exemplifies the brand.  Will happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear James,  It was our pleasure to welcome you to Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn. It means a lot to know that we have been consistently there for you during times when convenience and comfort are so important for you. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us, and that our location, amenities, as well as excellent service, were positive aspects. While you felt the bed was a bit too soft for your preference, we hope it offered the rest you deserved. The next time you return to our area,  please join us again.

Summary: Best experience ever! From the moment I got there to the moment I left, staff was very friendly and helpful. The atmosphere of this hotel caught my attention, which is why I decided to celebrate my anniversary there. I'm glad we did because we were treated so well. Everything is clean, beautiful and well designed. I'm definitely returning for another stay at this hotel.. I would recommend this hotel for anyone looking to stay in a place cozy yet elegant!

Nice hotel - room was large and well appointed,  Breakfast was served in a large cafeteria and included hot entrees - eggs, meat, potatoes, as well as the usual waffles, cereal, fruit, etc. We didn't notice any noise from the street nearby.

We stay in a lot of BW properties and this one is pretty much as expected. Fine room, convenient location, etc. We prefer BW because, as a diabetic, I don't find much to eat a carb-full breakfasts. This was the best BW yet. Wide variety of choices from eggs to waffles to cereals to yogurt and fruit plus coffee, tea, and lattes. The food was spread out in three rooms so there was no crowding. The pool looked nice, but we were too busy to use it.

The staff, room, food and property was perfect and I can't wait to go back for another stay.  I will recommend this hotel to all of my friends and relatives to stay here too.  The breakfast they serve is wonderful with sweet and savory food items.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy, Your enthusiastic recommendation of Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn brightened our day! Our team is so proud that you considered our accommodations, service, meals, and property to be perfect. We'll also let our breakfast team know that you loved their delicious mix of sweet and savory choices. We can't thank you enough for your outstanding review and would be honored to host you again.

Summary: The staff is professional, helpful and friendly- they make you feel as though you are at your home away from home.  The rooms are very clean-the beds are comfortable- the breakfast is very good. The price is very reasonable. I would not stay anywhere slse
Manager Response: Dear Janet, Our friendly staff truly enjoyed hosting you and will be thrilled they helped make you feel at home. It's great to hear that our clean, comfortable rooms provided you a restful night sleep and that you appreciated our competitive rates. We look forward to seeing you again at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn.

Summary: The hotel was close to the airport and the freeway, which was nice.  They do have an airport shuttle however you need to request it in advance.  We made the mistake of just calling down to request that the shuttle take us to the airport and that's when we found out that it wasn't available.  However, they did call us a taxi and pay for it which was very nice.  The staff was absolutely amazing.  Very helpful and very pleasant.  The breakfast was okay.  We ended up only getting it the first morning we were there.  They have a Jack in the Box and a Taco Grill next door plus 2 gas stations.  There was enough parking and the area appeared safe.  The pool and hot tub were sufficient.    My only major issue was that our reservation said we had 2 queen beds.  However they were actually

Summary Heading: Comfortable business hotel with great location
Summary: This was the first time I tried John Wayne Airport for a business trip to Huntington Beach. This hotel proved to meet all my expectations for the basics: bed, bath, desk, internet, printer, TV, security, and breakfast. Convenience for a late arrival at and early departure from SNA was outstanding: at 0630 on a Friday, I was delivered from the hotel, checked a bag, passed security, and at the gate in 20 min. (YMMV). I stayed 2 nights. The price was good. The next time I can avoid LAX to get to Orange County, this is where I plan to stay.

This hotel was fabulous! Upon arrival I was greeted by two very nice woman working the front desk. A $50 deposit wad required but I received that back almost instantly upon check out. I am always very weary about bugs at motels/hotels and so immediately I checked our room for any sign of bugs. There were none! This hotel was clean and I did not get bit while staying 2 nights. The room was immaculate. Believe me I am the pickiest of picky. The hallways smelled fabulous. There was a man shampooing the carpet in the hallway the 2nd day so it was obvious the owners and staff take very good care of this property. The parking lot is fresh and smooth. Entryways are perfect.The first night toilet got clogged(because of my son) and front desk sent maintenance over immediately no
Manager Response: Dear Lindsey, How wonderful to hear that we exceeded your expectations at every level. It was our pleasure to promptly assist you with the clogged toilet and we're so pleased our clean, fresh accommodations were just what you were looking for. Thank you for sharing how much you appreciated our broad variety of breakfast options and the inclusion of items for people with dietary restrictions. We're also pleased our proximity to the beach we perfect for your trip and that you had everything you needed for a truly memorable experience. We look forward to your next stay at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn.

Summary Heading: Great hotel great location for airport
Summary: Very clean and comfortable hotel.  The location was convenient for a departure out of  Santa Ana airport just a mile or 2 away.  Price was good for the area and the breakfast was great with a lot of choice.  Free parking.
Manager Response: Dear Tony, Your review is such a pleasure to read! We're glad that your stay with us was the convenient, comfortable, and affordable stay you were looking for before your flight out of Santa Ana. Thanks for choosing us at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn and for taking the time to review your stay. Please come again soon!

Every other employee is great, friendly,and even became friends with some because I‚Äôve stayed for over 1 month with my 6 year old niece and brother and his wife. His name is Khaled, and on Presidents‚Äô Day weekend he gave our room to someone else because prices went up. Even after we‚Äôve been there for 29 days at this point. We are looking for a new rental. Then proceeded to ask another employee if he should call the police after we were in the parking lot for one hour trying to find another place to stay. Orange count was 98% booked too for that weekend. After we came

Summary Heading: Warm welcome at front desk and comfortable room
Summary: I took a chance on this place after doing an Express Deal on Priceline, going for the 3 stars since I was only staying one night and would arrive after 10pm. Wanted parking and free wifi instead of fancy. Mary at the front desk was so warm and welcoming - her friendly and helpful style gave me a great experience. The lobby was much nicer than expected and the rooms were spacious, clean, and they even had complimentary bottles of water and an apple plus Cheez-it's for a snack in the room. A nice touch. I was pleasantly surprised and even better - realized later that night I had left my favorite hoodie in the room. Called Mary and she found it!
Manager Response: Dear Karen,   Thank  you very much for taking the time writing a review on TripAdvisor to let the others know about your stay at the Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Hotel in Costa Mesa the city of Arts.   We appreciate your wonderful review of our Hotel.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your warm complements to our staff members.   We hope to serve you once again very soon in the future and to be able to earn your 100% satisfaction.   Sincerely,   Naj Ekhlas General Manager  Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Hotel

Summary Heading: Now our official OC weekend getaway destination
Summary: This well-maintained and friendly facility gives you all the benefits of a great hotel, close to the beach but for much, much less than so-called fancy places just 3 miles down the road (in Newport Beach itself). From this location you are just minutes from Newport Beach but also fortunately located south of the I-405 and SR 73, with access to many side roads to enable you to avoid most of the beach traffic. The rooms are spacious, beds super comfortable, nice indoor Jacuzzi and outdoor pool, exercise room, etc. full-on hot breakfast, and the staff is very friendly. The only drawback is that they can run out of parking spaces very late on weekend nights, but they do keep a few spaces "off limits during the day" for this purpose. A nice touch is the each floor has its own
Manager Response: Dear Steve, We are thrilled to be your go-to destination! Thank you so much for detailing the many benefits of a stay at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn. We're particularly pleased to read that our location offers you terrific convenience at an exceptional value! As you noted, our common areas are the perfect place to gather and relax and maybe meet a new friend or two. Come back and see us again soon!

Summary: The hotel itself is quite nice- the room looked clean and comfortable but the bathroom smelled and upon closer inspection, had mold issues that were patched but not taken care of. But the hotel looses its stars for their thin walls and poor handling of a noise complaint. At midnight, I called to make a noise complaint about the room above me. The hotel called the room and the noise stopped for about 30 minutes only to resume again. I tried calling the desk a second time but the phone rang about 30 times before I hung up. By 3am, the elephant like stomping continued so I asked the front desk to let me in the gym so I could get my am workout in before my meeting at 8am. They refused saying that it disturbs the neighbours. Obviously, this hotel needs to invest in sound proofing.
Manager Response: Dear Honorable guest,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay with us.   First of all on behalf of our entire team I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations during your stay with us and experienced such inconvenience. Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback by telling us what you like about your stay and how we can improve our service.   We hope to serve you better in the future by implementing the improvement and to be able to earn your 100% satisfaction.  Sincerely,   Naj Ekhlas General Manager

Summary: Friendly and helpful staff upon check.  in. Nice foyer with beautiful staircase with wooden handrail. Free parking, internet, and breakfast. Clean and comfortable guest room with nice decor. ART access right in front of property.
Manager Response: Dear David, It was our pleasure to have you stay with us during your recent visit to Costa Mesa. We are pleased that you enjoyed your clean and comfortable room and that you appreciated the lovely decor of our public areas including our gorgeous staircase.  Our team thanks you for your kind words about their friendly and helpful service, and we are happy to hear you liked your delicious breakfast. The next time you visit the area, we hope you stay with us again here at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn.

Summary Heading: Five stars for the property ‚Äî loses 2 stars for billing issues
Summary: This was a great hotel, comfortable and well-kept. They treated me well as a Diamond member and gave me a great room. The walls are thin and you can hear domestic disputes. But for a Best Western, I was impressed. Interior hallways! Underground parking! A hot tub! All great stuff.  Things fell apart because they billed my credit card instead of deducting points. Then, instead of fixing it, they ignored me for weeks until I had to open a case with corporate. Even then, they were non-responsive. I left some negative feedback directly via my post-stay survey ‚Äî and the manager responded by leaving a long, angry voicemail on my phone. So... a good property with some administration issues.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We thanks for your great review and we appreciate your warm complements to our staff members but we regret to hear that we did not help you regarding your payment for your stay. Please note that the date you stayed with us , there was  no BW Reward points available in your account to cover your stay, therefore we have to charge your credit card for payment.  We did explain to you that  according to our procedure we can not exchange the back stay posting with your points what you earned later but as our courtesy we agree with Best Western customer service to refund your credit card against the points. I think you should appreciate it.   We hope to serve you better in the future and able to earn your 100% satisfaction.   Sincerely,

Summary: This was a very convenient location off the freeway and close to the mall. Attractive lobby, friendly check in. We had a beautiful king room with oversized rocker chair, wet bar and deep soaking tub. There was a small snack basket and 2 bottle of water for us. Very comfortable. Hot breakfast served in a small cafe room with everything. Eggs, bacon, yoghurt, waffles, fruit and more! We could definitely see this was a ‚Äúplus‚Äù Best Western.
Manager Response: Our team at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn loves reading reviews like yours. Our goal is to provide all of our guests with service and comfort just as you have described, and and we appreciate you letting us know that we are achieving that goal. It is wonderful to read that the little extras, like snacks and bottled water, mean a lot to our guests, and that our location gives easy access to all that our community has to offer. It would be a pleasure to have you as our guests again in the future.

Summary Heading: Convenient location though not a thrill
Summary: This hotel is in a convenient (by car) location within easy driving distance of Newport Beach, Irvine, South Coast Plaza, etc.  Not the nicest location‚Äîbasically right next to the 55 freeway, though noise wasn't a problem‚Äîand just a tad on the sketchy side safety-wise, but it was okay.  Like other Best Western Pluses we've stayed at, this one is in need of a major remodel‚Äîrooms are fine but dated and dark.  Paint colors are depressing.  Breakfast choices were fine‚Äînothing to write home about, but decent hotel fare.  Very good rates for the area and free parking‚Äîmight stay here again because of that and because of the hotel's proximity to nearby attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit. We very much appreciate your insight into the experience and are happy to hear that you would stay with us again. Based on your feedback, we think you will be glad to know that we are currently undergoing some exciting renovations to our accommodations. We look forward to sharing these updates with our guests and providing you with an even better stay in the future. Let us build on the positives of our free parking and excellent affordability and host you again here in Costa Mesa. We hope to serve you better in the future and to be able to earn your 100% satisfaction.   Sincerely,

Summary: We prepaid our rooms the night before checking out as we were leaving very early to catch a flight.  At about 12:20 a.m. someone tried to enter our room, but the chain prevented entry.  A few minutes later someone tried again to enter the room and the chain prevented entry. We then received a call from the front desk asking us what name we were checked in under.  I gave the front desk clerk our name and he told me we were not registered.  I told him we were registered to check out the morning of January 7.  He then asked me to come to the front desk in the morning.  A short time later someone knocked loudly on our door.  Time elapsed since this incident started had been about 30 minutes.  After the knock I realized that someone had an active key to our room and was harassing us
Manager Response: Dear Honorable Guest,   On behalf of our entire team , I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you give us to implement improvement to ensure we offer better experience for guests in the future. As I mentioned to you before that our booking system generated an error when you asked to get earlier checked out receipt. This caused confusion to our crew. Once again we apologized for you inconvenience.   We hope to serve you better in the future and earn your 100% satisfaction.   Sincerely,  Naj Ekhlas

Summary: Great service, clean room, great breakfast, but wish we could take some back to our room.  Understand why not.  Excellent coffee!  Loved the pool and spa!  Were not able to access fitness room. Would have been nice if family could have joined us for breakfast, but the food was great!
Manager Response: We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay at Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn! Our team is happy to hear that our wonderful service and clean accommodations met your expectations. We're also glad that you enjoyed a lovely breakfast! We're sorry to hear that you weren't able to access our fitness room during your visit. However, It's wonderful to learn that you loved our other amenities. Many thanks for your thoughtful compliments and we'd love to have you return.

Summary Heading: Visiting in-laws at Fountain Valley, CA
Summary: Was looking for a guest room with 2 queen beds. BW Plus was only the place that offers that.  It turned out that the beds were only full size.  Anyway, had a nice 8-day stay at BW Plus. Breakfast was great, and room was always kept clean. Also there was no problem finding a parking space late at night.
Manager Response: Dear Matthew, We appreciate you staying with us for your extended visit. It's great to hear that our tasty breakfast options gave you a great start to the day and that you never had trouble finding parking. We're also glad you enjoyed your overall stay in our clean, comfortable rooms. However, we apologize for any confusion regarding the size of the beds. The next time you're in town to see family, we'd be honored to host you.

Summary: We stayed one night over Christmas holidays at the BW Plus Newport Mesa. Room was spacious, clean and had loads of bathroom toiletries. Breakfast had a full range of items. Staff was nice and helpful. We would choose to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Emanuel, We're honored you chose to stay with us during your Christmas trip and thank you for the kind words. It's nice to hear that our clean, spacious rooms and full complement of bathroom amenities added to your comfort and that our broad variety of breakfast selections left you satisfied. Our friendly staff will be pleased you appreciate their assistance during your visit. We look forward to seeing you again the next time you're in town.

Summary: This hotel is solid, offering a very good breakfast selection, clean and comfy rooms with a very friendly staff. I would definitely bring my family here again. The location is great and close to the beach (15 mins), South Coast Plaza (10 mins) and John Wayne Airport (7 mins). Free parking on-site.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit! It was a treat to have you with us and we greatly appreciate you taking a moment to share your experience. It sounds like our location was perfect for you and we hope you had a lovely time in the area. Hearing that you would return with your family is the greatest reward that we could ask for and we thank you! Our entire team eagerly anticipates making your day again very soon.

Summary: I've stayed at this BW+ before and if I come back I'll stay Again. The rooms are always spotless and the beds comfortable.The decor is quite relaxing.  I have found the staff helpful and cordial.  The separate breakfast restaurant is quite pleasant.  Each morning they offer a variation of scrambled eggs and meats..  This morning in addition to standard scrambled eggs they offered  eggs made with feta cheese and spinach. The meats were sausage and/or bacon  There are also the standard items, waffles, pastries etc.

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus, Costa Mesa/Newport Beach
Summary: This hotel is a good value for the money.  The hotel is clean, neat, and attractive.  The location is convenient.  The hotel staff was very attentive.  The breakfast area was comfortable and the staff did not rush us away.
Manager Response: Dear Honorable Guest,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your stay at the Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Hotel in Costa Mesa.  We value your feedback by telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can implement more improvement. You are also helping us to deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future.  We are glade that you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your warm complements to our staff members.   Hope to see you once again in the near future.   Sincerely,   Naj Ekhlas  General Manager  Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Hotel

Summary: I am a big Best Western fan as I've never had a bad experience in any of their hotels. I am also a BW Rewards member. Some experiences have been better than others, but all of been positive. Whenever I visit my family in Newport Beach I stay in this hotel. It is convenient to the highways and it is always a pleasant stay.  This hotel offers clean and comfortable rooms and has plenty of amenities. My favorite is the hot breakfast offered and the warmth and friendliness of the breakfast crew. They always make you feel welcome. Please don't forget to tip them.  The front desk and other service staff are always welcoming, warm and friendly, as well as professional.   The parking is excellent and has both indoor and outdoor areas. There is also a heated swimming pool and spa if you

We love staying at the Best Western for business and just for a weekend getaway with the grandkids. The rooms are comfortable and spacious, the free breakfast is awesome, and the staff is always friendly, and remembers us when we arrive.

Summary Heading: Excellent Place to Stay for a Balboa Bay Resort Wedding
Summary: I chose this hotel as an affordable alternative place to stay for my nephew's Balboa Bay Resort wedding.  Best Western offered free shuttle to and from the airport which is only about 4 miles away.  We took an Uber to the wedding which was also just a few miles away.  The hotel was clean and well appointed.  I especially liked the two delicious apples, snack basket, and bottled water--an unexpected treat!  The full breakfast was adequate, but I would have liked more fresh fruit.  The layout of the breakfast area was the only negative.  Overall, I would highly recommend!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay with family staffs were helpful and friendly , access to free ways was fantastic . Breakfast was
Summary: Excellent place to stay with family staffs were helpful and friendly , access to free ways was fantastic . Breakfast was awesome ,plenty of parking lots , well maintained swimming pool , room service was fantastic , I will recommend to any one

Very clean! Location was very convenient but unfortunately the room was too close to the front of the building which make for a higher noise level. Good quality over all for the area. Familiar with the are and will stay again in the future

The room was was very clean and the bed was comfortable.  The breakfast was hot and very good. We will definitely stay at this hotel the next time we are in town.  The only issue for me, not my spouse was the ice machine on the 3rd floor is loud when it is making ice, Rooms near the ice machine can hear the noise through the door at night.

I enjoy staying at this Best Western - the rooms are clean- the price is right .  Most of all the staff is always professional and helpful. The two staff members who go out of their way to make you feel at home and make your stay more enjoyable are Romi and Sachie. I will be staying here again in January 2018.

Summary Heading: Nice stay at BW Newport Mesa
Summary: Convenient location off the freeway. Super fast and easy checkin and very friendly. I was upgraded to an executive room, which was great. Really large, had nice 'bonus' touches and inclusions, and provided an excellent night's sleep. Nothing really close nearby, but you can drive to find restaurants. Wi-Fi was great and I used it late into the evening. Breakfast was included and was fine. Would not hesitate to return.

Horrible. Some water fell from the bathroom above into my dopp kit in our bathroom. Clean the rooms; fix the plumbing; get more responsive clerks; wash the carpets. When we first tried to get into our room the lock did not work. They moved us around the building. The ceiling in the bathroom of the second room leaked spilling water on my dopp bag. God knows if it was shower water, toilet water or sprinkler water. They then moved us back to the original room we were in. The lock worked the second time, but only for two of four cards. The manager told me he would discount the room rate by 50%. When I checked out, only one of three nights was discounted by 50%. If I knew that he only meant to discount only one night, I would have switched hotels. This was one of the worst, if not

Another nice touch was the welcome basket.  The motel has been around awhile, but it's clean, comfortable, quiet, and affordable.  Close to a number of attractions. Very pleasant, professional staff, especially Kelly.  Pretty, cozy outside pool area. Good breakfast and really good coffee.

The Hotel - Upon approach, the hotel looks a little small and cramped and the parking lot is a bit tight but, as they say, do not judge a book by its cover. The lobby is bright and spacious; the modern decor sprinkled with eclectic chrome pieces, the high ceiling, art deco chandelier and sweeping staircase create a light air of sophistication. Beyond the lobby is a convenience kiosk for basic needs, with 24/7 coffee and water service.   There is outdoor seating on the second floor and a small outdoor pool area. The breakfast cafe, in the building opposite the lobby entrance, is bright, has plenty of seating and can be busy. The breakfast buffet includes: oj and several other beverages, coffee, tea, cereals, granola, yogurt, dried fruits, breads, bagels, pastries, waffle station

This so convently located for where I go and who I see.  I try to stay here when ever I'm in Costa Mesa.  This hotel is so easy to get anywhere in Orange County.  I was meeting friends for lunch so no breakfast that morning, but breakfast is good

What a lovely stay!! Great location, not far from the beach. Awesome friendly staff with quick chin in& out. Breakfast was nice with hot items and very good coffee!! Would definetly reccomend and will be backmin the future! Keeo uo the excellent work!

Nice clean rooms.  But short on staff if you need something late at night or overnight.  Only one employee there that cannot leave the desk.  Parking is limited even with the garage if its a full house.  The breakfast was nice.

The stay is always pleasant i will never stay any where but Best Western Plus Newport Mesa Inn everyone is very courteous they go out there way to help.also everyone speak to you in the hallway Newport mesa Inn is the best

Updated rooms with attention to cleanliness detail.  Nice amenities.   I was very happy with my stay and I am very picky, I stay in a lot of hotels.  For the money, I don't think you can beat the value.   Such detail as the TV remote was in a "fresh Remote" bag.  The complimentary water and snack basket was a nice touch as well

We've been coming here for about 10 years during the OC Fair. At first, because of easy access to the fair, now because it's a great place to stay! The rooms are always clean, there is water and snacks that many hotels charge an arm and a leg for, a coffee maker, a microwave and a mini fridge. So many places don't provide these amenities. Their complimentary breakfast is also a great feature! It's not just pastries- it's eggs, waffles, sausage, bacon, great assortment of breads, beverages.... üëçüèªüëçüèª

Stayed at this location twice nowin Spring and Summer. Conveniently located to points both south, down to Dana Point and Laguna Beach, and north, to LA and beyond. Easy access to freeways, as well. The breakfast service is well timed starting early at 6am. Would definitely stay here again!

Great place for friends and family, breakfast, parking and Internet included.  Easy access to PCH and area freeways.  Lots of food places from fast and casual to expensive.  One in our little group of friends needed to get to John Wayne Airport, hotel had a free shuttle...great!

Summary Heading: I give this Best Western Plus an A+
Summary: This Best Western hotel is a Plus for sure. From the friendly and accommodating guest service representatives to the housekeepers, I give them an A+. Not only was my room sparkling clean, and I must say I'm quite picky. The hallways and window seals were dust free, crisp and clean. The breakfast was a real hit with my family. We loved the hot fresh items and variety of the eggs was a nice surprise each day. They even have a make your own waffle bar with a nice selection of toppings or if your feeling creative you can incorporate it into your waffle.  Thank you for for the hospitality and most comfortable accommodations.

We have stayed here twice for at least a week each time.  It is a clean hotel with a very nice staff.  The pool was heated, so we got to enjoy it on a cooler day.  It is right off a main highway, so the location fit our needs to visit family in Newport Beach and the surrounding areas.  Free breakfast was good to start the day off.

Easy access off freeway , close to the beaches and real chill atmosphere. Mexican food easy to walk to and a convince store in walking distance . Love the pool and spa! I stay there all the time . Thumbs up!!!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, basic amenities, free bfast
Summary: The hotel is directly next to the freeway, but the room we had was quiet. Very nice check-in staff, rooms were clean and well-appointed, bed was very comfy. Free breakfast was basic but good. Only minus was wifi was VERY slow and sometimes couldn't connect. 15 minute drive to the beach, restaurants, stores, etc. Drove 20 minutes to the Nixon Library to check that out as well.

Staff is terrific, the Inn is clean inside and out and well maintained.   Convenient location  Caution!   Be sure to inquire about rates if you change any part of your initial reservation.  We extended our stay by one night and the rate DOUBLED for that one night.  I was NOT advised of that and I was shocked and would not have stayed

Summary Heading: The BEST best western ever! Incredible experience
Summary: We stayed three nights in July. Staff reception was awesome. Breakfast is catered -- they have two people who serve and clean up, its a large breakfast with three hot items and waffles....best motel breakfast i've ever had. Furthermore, its in its own building, with wi fi which is awesome. Parking is plenty including underground if you want to keep your car from sunlight. Rooms are very clean and massive, they also have a fitness center with a bike, treadmill and weight machines and elliptical. Also have a hot tub with jets and a medium size pool to chill in. Very close to things in Orange county. Would definitely return without question. The best motel experience I've ever had for the price. Wi fi was also strong.

Check in process was quick and easy. Our room was great!  Very clean,and when house keeping tidied room they "tucked in" my son's stuffed toy for him. Everything smells and looks clean. Snack basket waiting in the room was a great plus!  Will be staying here next time we are in the area! Free breakfast, parking, and WIFI!

Wow! I was expecting this to be a regular Best Western. I have stayed at a few crummy hotels recently. The best part was the room was dark, the mattress was super comfortable, the air conditioner was great. It stayed on all night. I have stayed at plenty of places where the air conditioner resets to a higher temp late at night. Nicely decorated, plenty of parking. The breakfast was great. Served in a separate restaurant with actual linens and servers. Pool area was quiet. There is an enclosed hot tub that overlooks the outdoor pool.

Pros: very friendly and helpful front desk clerk, extravagant lobby, clean room with so many extras (welcome baskets of food and travel sized personal items), generous full breakfast, reasonable price in a good location to access other orange county sites Cons: Outdoor pool and jacuzzi had outdoor debris in them, bags of garbage and pizza boxes collected at end of hallway leading to pool

The bed sheet in our room appeared to have feces on it. We called to the front desk immediately where the clerk said, "uh-huh, well, I'll send someone." No apology or room switch. A person appears with a stack of sheets and tells us we must change the bed sheets ourselves. What a disgusting experience.
Manager Response: Dear Linda,   On behalf of our entire team I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you give us to implement improvement to ensure we offer better experience for guests in the future. I am sorry to hear that as we do have the best record of cleaning in our Guests review at all time. We will be investigating and make sure not happy ever.  I hope to serve you better very soon once again at the near future.  Sincerely,  Naj Ekhlas GM

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel quite a few times over the last 6 years.  It's always clean, the staff is always friendly and helpful and breakfast is yummy!  It's close to the beach, shopping, and great restaurants!

Front desk was exceptionally helpful. Internet connection information shared at check in, and was easy to access. Furniture just right. Room was sufficiently spacious and comfortable. We like to open windows, so that is a real plus for us even though it does mean some intrusion of outside noise. Breakfast excellent. All in all a positive experience.

Excellent hotel, customer service and comfortable place to lay your head!  Will definitely recommend this hotel and stay here when I return for vacations!  The breakfast was outstanding, the staff was accommodating and friendly!

Summary Heading: Guess you can get cheaper places that are not much worse
Summary: There wasn't anything particular to like about this place. Breakfast was very basic. The whole place feels a bit run down. Extremely noisy A/C. When I arrived there were some guys in the back of the parking area (where I had to park) with some big SUV pick ups having a 'party' They were pretty noisy and wasted and made you feel uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Frankspy,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write your experience about your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we will be using the feedback you give us to implement the improvement. We hope to serve you once again  very soon in the near future to have another chance to provide you with a superior experience and to be able to earn your 100% satisfaction.   Sincerely,  Naj Ekhlas

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for an evening.  It was very clean and quiet.  Everything was working and the staff was very helpful when needed.  The breakfast was very good and a nice variety of foods.  This is a well maintained property.

The lobby and grounds of the hotel are very nice.  It is close to main roads, but you are a little secluded the way the courtyard is set up.   The room itself was nice.  Comfy beds and a nice bathroom with nice amenities.  The shower pressure was low, and that was a big minus for me, but I am rather particular on shower pressure.    Had I been traveling on business, the wifi may have been a little slow, but for my leisure trip it was just fine.   Overall, the location is good and our experience was pleasant.

There was a serious conflict between the date we thought we were set to arrive, and the actual arrival date.  However, the desk clerk not only honored our reservation, but gave us an upgrade without additional charge.  It may be that the upgrade was the only option because of room availability, but she didn't have to do that.

The hotel was clean & well maintained.  The beds were very comfortable, the WIFI worked great & the cold breakfast buffet items were supplemented with make them yourself waffles as well as scrambled eggs & a rotating choice of bacon or sausage each day.  The location was very convenient for us.

Our stay at the Best Western Newport Mesa Inn was very enjoyable. The employees are helpful, respectful and are willing to go out of their way to help their guests.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  The beds are comfortable and so are the pillows. The breakfast is very good. The price is reasonable. We plan to stay there again on our next trip to California in October.

We're impressed with this hotel! It needs d√©cor updating in the rooms, but that is truly to only 'negative'. The rooms are comfortable and clean. The beds are very comfortable. The staff is courteous and polite. Breakfast, included in the room rate, is 4-stars, if not 5. I've never had this quality of hotel provided breakfast. Two choices of scrambled eggs each day (plain, with ham & cheese, veggie), sausage or bacon, potatoes and a large variety of breads, cereals, pastries. They offer gluten free items.

I've always passed up booking Best Western hotels. I don't know why exactly. Based on positive reviews we booked this one on a recent trip to visit family. We were pleasantly surprised by the beautiful, airy lobby and the welcoming front desk staff. Our room was large, well appointed with fresh fruit and granola bars and lots of bathroom toiletries. The beds were comfy enough. But the highlight was the separate breakfast cafe. It has a European look pretty arched doors with white table cloths, open, high ceilings. It was a lovely way to start our day. We appreciated the sign letting guests know the food was not to be taken from the cafe. A server attended the hot foods area. It is definitely a step up from typical free breakfast venues.

Don't stay here if you want a good nights sleep!  This place is your average Best Western hotel. For the money not too bad/not too good.  We were put in a double queen room 330, with an adjoining paper thin (but of course locked) door to the room next door room 329. Night of 10th June...  And unfortunately there was an _extremely_ loud and noise family next to us in the adjoining room...  I'm a family man and it pleases me when people have a good time, but this was just over the top!  At 11.30 pm "ish" they were watching a movie extremely loud chatting laughing. We ignored it because they were properly just gonna finish the movie and then go to bed... but guess again.  After that they started playing each other's favorite youtube videos.  And don't get me wrong here - I'm happy

Your satisfaction is very impotent to us and we will be using the feedback you give us to implement improvement to insure we offer better experience for guest in the future.  Please note that we are very serious regarding guests who disturbing peace and we are committed to make sure our guests have a good night sleep. Our record shows that the guest has been informed by our customer service as soon as received call from you regarding the noise. The guest who stay next to you, immediately apologized. Please note that we do immediately take care of the guest who is disturbing the peace if we receive the second complains.  Once again we are sorry and hope that you consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   Sincerely,  Naj Ekhlas General Manager

Summary: Very clean hotel, conveniently close to OC fairgrounds, Segerstrom theater and Southcoast Plaza.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  Breakfast is very nice, well staffed with good service.  We'll be back when we're in the area.  Be sure to ask for the 'upgrade'.

It takes a lot to beat my expectations... especially when you're a Best Western PLUS!  All the little things you'd expect were there... a clean room, comfortable bed, friendly staff, a good hot breakfast in a clean, spacious and cheery breakfast room, etc.  I was not expecting the crown moldings, the incredibly comfortable over-stuffed chair that was actually was a recliner, the deep soaker tub, even the sanitized remote control next to the slippers and robe all wrapped up and provided for my convenience!  The staff was very friendly, offered great suggestions on restaurants and remembered my name, not that I'm anyone special, but they sure made me feel like I was!  The pillows were plentiful and comfortable. The bed was wonderful. I found the large desk very useful, as I was on

I've stayed here 3 times and it was very pleasant. While each experience was slightly different, overall the staff was excellent from the front desk to housekeeping to the breakfast crew - helpful and friendly.   The room was clean, spacious, well appointed, and filled with amenities. However on one visit, the bed linen and cover were rough to the touch and that slightly effected my sleep comfort. On my last visit, (May, 2017) the A/C compressor was too loud and woke me several times.  An added plus is the full breakfast. The area is good and the staff consistently excellent-polite and helpful.  My son reports that his hot tub experience was excellent. Never tried the pool but I am looking forward to it on my next visit.  Parking is quite ample and the Inn is well-located in

This was our 10th or so stay at this place. I have not yet had an issue, and have always felt welcome. Convenient location, quiet and safe. We have had to stay elsewhere a couple times when they were booked, and found no comparison. I purposely never give 5 full stars, but these folks well deserve it. Also, best breakfast in town!

Summary Heading: Want an exceptional hotel - THIS IS IT!
Summary: Excellent is not sufficient to describe this hotel.  The property, staff, food, EVERYTHING and EVERYONE were exceptional, genuine and REAL!  We will definitely come back to this hotel, when in the region.

Room comfortable a King size room to rear of property, had microwave, refrigerator, also in room safe a bonus for passports, electrical items etc.  Air con  unit very noisy, could hear planes from airport when unit was switched off.  Room furniture  a little dated.    Pool area small  with six bed and three tables saw very few guests using area. Small gym area spa tub noisy . Reasonable breakfast selection hot food served by staff member. One Web site I came across incorrectly states that this hotel has restaurant and bar.

I had never been in the area before and did not know what to expect. I found that this hotel met all my needs . It is clean, fairly modern and well run with courteous and very helpful staff.  I will definitely stay there the next time I am in the area.

Breakfast was SPECTACULAR! And breakfast employees were SUPER helpful and friendly. Clean and quiet. Comfortable bed. Decor needs updating but great overall. Location is great. Just a few miles away from everything you need.  Would stay here again!

Nice and clean hotel with a great breakfast - staff really nice too. Small but ok pool area. Spacious room and bathroom. Close enough to beach without having to pay beach prices. Would come back here any time!

I actual stayed here April 2016 , I will never stay here again !! The charged my credit card 200 dollars claiming I was smoking weed which I wasn't !!!! My sister room had to be changed in the middle of the night because of bed bugs that attacked on night one .. this was the worst experience I every had at a hotel from mangement down the treated us horrible claiming we bought bed bug to hotel and they would have to ask US to leave the hotel based on if the found anything .. I have never been more humiliated in my life , they really made us feel like we where not worthy to stay at the hotel !!! I highly don't recommend people stay at this hotel !!!!! Stay away pleases don't go . I made complaints to best western headquarters and the told there was nothing they could do about it.

Summary: This hotel was in a very convenient location, close to freeways, beach, and university. It was clean and comfortable, and the breakfast was plenty. The only downfall was that there appeared to be human trafficing going on in the evenings.

This is the hotel of choice for the OC Half Marathon. The hotel is a quick 10 min walk to the bus pickup and finish line. The overall quality of the hotel is nice and comfortable. You will be refreshed with this hotel when you wake up and start your race.

Summary Heading: Best bargain in town - very pleasant stay
Summary: For  a getaway weekend, this was a perfect place for my wife and me. The accommodations are spacious and very clean (ask for the business upgrade), the on-site facilities are small but quite adequate and the staff is wonderful. In fact they are doing everything RIGHT that many similar hotels are doing WRONG these days. The beds are extremely comfortable and well-maintained, parking and Wi-Fi are free, and they serve a free full, excellent breakfast each day. My wife and I really love this location - close to but not at the beach (where prices can easily double for the same or lesser room) and you are also very close to the Irvine Spectrum and Newport Beach. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. We would definitely come back!

hotel located to easy access to beach, Disneyland,, Angels baseball, South Coast Plaza shopping center, freeways to get to So. Cal sights. Price including hot, fully cooked breakfast was great. Staff very helpful with out early check-in.

Very clean and modern, convenient location in Orange County.  Lovely lobby, quiet room, easy parking and nice breakfast.  Great bathroom amenities and shower head.  Three separate sinks would make getting ready speedy for everyone.

From the minute we arrived Romi at the front desk greeted us in our native languages. Romi and Mary expedited our checkin process. The room was clean and comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was hot and tasty. A very nice experience.

It was a very clean property and check-in and check-out were extremely fast.  Room was clean and comfortable, asked for top floor and it was very quiet as well.  Breakfast was above average for continental as they had corn tortillas and refried beans/green chile, so could make quite the breakfast tacos.    Easy to get to location right off the interstate, however, not a very "walkable" location.  Was OK for business, but do like to walk when on vacation.  I looked at the pool area and it would be adequate for a quick dip and to read a book for a bit.  The location can't be beat as a $10 Uber to the water...

Clean and comfortable, good value older property 15 min from PCH/ 5 min from John Wayne airport. Friendly, compentent staff.  Spacious handicap-accessible room (just too close to elevator noise).  Adequate free breakfast. Good base for exploring Newport/Laguna area.

Business trip, just one night here, but all in all a fairly nice place. My king room was quite comfortable and larger than many rooms I've stayed in. The closet was huge and I've never seen a hotel closet as big this one was. They could replace the carpets in the hallways because my first impression was they were incredibly dirty, only to figure out it was the color of the carpets, not dirt.

The rooms were nice, clean, and included blankets... which for some reason many hotels don't have anymore. The pool was warm and the hot-tub was enjoyable. The dining area was large. The free breakfast was good.  The waffles were fantastic.

Summary Heading: Nice place for an older hotel
Summary: Not a Five star hotel but not bad. They have a great breakfast and are within driving distance to great restaurants. The pool and gym are tin.  The rooms are clean and have everything you need but nothing fancy. The heating and air are basic models you see in every motel, meaning they are noisy and not very modern. But they work.  The beds are very good and there is no smell or anything wierd. Easy access to freeway too.

We really liked this hotel and the staff.  Everybody was professional and friendly.  Great location and very clean room. We would stay here again if in the Newport Beach area. Breakfast were very good and an upgrade over most.

Clean large room, personable staff, and good breakfast.  Also used small pool, small hot tub, and small fitness center.  All facilities worked well, even though they are on the small side.  Location is close to Newport Beach. Stayed here before a couple years ago and had the same positive experience.  They also have covered parking for no extra fee and that is always a plus for me.

Came here for a seminar. I didn't book a room this time. This review is only for the visit.  This place is very clean & aesthetic pleasing to the eye. What i dislike is that the cafe is only available to guests. It would be a good idea to charge a fee for non-guests, who are here for a seminar. Luckily, there's a Jack in the Box next door. I like the fact that complimentary coffee is offered at the lobby. Underground parking is a plus too.

Summary Heading: This hotel is a real PLUS for the area
Summary: So close to the ocean and the trendy shops and food options, stay here and enjoy the pool or spend the day at the beach. You will have a great breakfast, free parking, great welcome amenities and pay a very competitive rate for your experience.

Nice clean place to stay at a reasonable cost. It was conveniently located near the Irvine area where I was working. The access to the freeway and local streets was very good. I did not use the pool or breakfast due to scheduling, but they seemed to be in good order.

Summary Heading: I will always stay at this property when I go to Newport Beach
Summary: Romi and Mary are the reason why I stay at this property. They make you feel like at home and always with that welcome smile. The food at breakfast time is also the best of the best westerns I have stayed at.

Great little hotel, spacious rooms, reasonable sized bathroom, beds are comfortable and rooms well equipped. Not much surrounding this motel but it is quiet and comfortable. Breakfast is very yummy and offers a good selection of foods. Staff are friendly and accommodating.

Had a conference in Costa Mesa.  Picked the Best Western Plus due to proximity to conference.  Doesn't look great from the outside, but the room was very nice.  Breakfast was good and the staff were very helpful.  The room had all the amenities that you would hope for in a hotel.  Would definitely stay there again.

I am a repeat customer and have always been satisfied with the Newport Mesa Inn.  The rooms are large, clean and the staff has always been helpful. There is easy access to OC Fair grounds, Beach and plenty of places to eat.  I like the complimentary gift basket placed in the rooms.  That is very thoughtful

Staff at the hotel were great. They were friendly and helpful. Breakfast was delicious and the attendants were very helpful. The room was decorated nice and very clean. Would love to visit this hotel again next time I'm in Orange County.

Stayed three nights at this comfortable, clean Best Western. Nice, clean breakfast room with a huge variety of items, staff came by and took plates, etc. Great location near Newport Beach, lots to do in the area without spending your entire vacation money on a room.  I highly recommend.

Summary: There wasn't much to walk to so a car is necessary.  We selected this property as we were able to use travel points and it included breakfast.  The property was recently renovated so looked nice but there were still small telltale signs of the old property (e.g. brown scratched up door frame).  We booked 2 adjoining rooms which were comfortable, clean, and good bathroom counter space (important for multiple of people sharing space).  One room had an extra sink outside the bathroom which was convenient.  The other room had a slightly larger bathroom and had extra counter space outside the bathroom (no extra sink).  There was a hotel store by the front desk for snacks and small items.  The gym was tiny, I didn't bother using it.  The hot tub and swimming pool were adequate sizes.

Summary: This was our 2nd time staying there. The rooms are very clean & the staff are very helpful. We haven't had the free breakfast due to there's a great restaurant on the corner that serves breakfast and lunch. We'll stay there again!

Summary: My Husband and I stayed for 3 days here for the Musink festival..We stayed in room 311, we didn't notice the conference room and ice machine was across from us, but when in use it got pretty noisy. Other then that, no complaints! Everything was great! Bed was super comfortable, staff was great, and the breakfast was surprisingly good.

This is a beautiful property, centrally located, with a staff that runs from very engaged to "I couldn't care less." The rooms, amenities, and the breakfast are excellent.  This is the second time I've stayed here. I am a BW Diamond Select member and I decided to pay for the room instead of using points. At check out when I pointed out that my room rate was overcharged the clerk shrugged and walked away. I had no time to argue as I needed to get to the airport. So be warned to check your bill. I will be filing a complaint with BW.  Lastly, at check-in the front desk clerk sold a room for $90.00 while I was charged $135.00 for the same room.

The employee do not have any interest to over charge anyone, and our rate is never less then 109.99 during low season and always our standard rack rate from 149.99 to 289.99 based on occupancy and activities in the area.
